Articles.Content:
I have an admittingly large modlist, but I was hoping someone else might have encountered this bug or suspect it might be related to one of my mods. I've already tried reloading without some possible culprits, like Parallax 2.0, SVE, PlanetShine, but it doesn't seem to have fixed the issue.

Basically, the parts (a decoupler and another set of fuel tank pods) below this (MKS) Kerbitat appear translucent through my Kerbitat, with some color distortion. I notice that this happens pretty often for a bunch of my ships, whether or not they are in orbit.



My modlist:

Edited September 25, 2022 by Guolin
I’ve seen this before, I think it’s a TUFX thing? Try a different profile or uninstalling it entirely.

TUFX HDR can cause that.

I think there's a recent change to TUFX. It used to (at least when installed via CKAN) have separate HDR and non-HDR profiles. Now there's just one set of profiles with HDR always on. I use a different set of profiles (BallistFox0) and don't pay much attention to the stock profiles. Check the TUFX thread and changelog for more info.
Thanks all! None of the TUFX profiles removed the problem, but fully uninstalling it did the trick . I didn't even know I had it, it was installed by a different mod haha
